name: Sculpture Learning
tagline: Adaptive automatic behaviours generation software for interactive art sculptures
body:
### CBLA Test Bed Project

## Overview

The software for the CBLA Test Bed was written to enable both reliable local functions and complex inter-node functions.
The main microcontroller used in the current version of the CBLA Test Bed is Teensy. Its code is written in Arduino and compiled using Teensyduino. Each Teensy is connected to computer through USB connection. 

## System Requirements

* Windows OS (tested on Windows 8, but should work on XP, Vista and & too)
* [Python 3.3+](https://www.python.org/downloads/)
* [pyUSB](https://github.com/walac/pyusb)
* [libusb-win32](http://sourceforge.net/p/libusb-win32/wiki/Home/)
